{"id":884845473,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1674628265,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"27 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/884845473/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.3 MB","code":"// Time Complexity : O(n)\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int rightSum = accumulate(nums.begin(), nums.end(), 0);\n        int leftSum = 0;\n        \n        for (int idx = 0; idx < nums.size(); idx++) {\n\n            // subtract current elements with from rightSum...\n            rightSum -= nums[idx];\n\n            // If the sum of all the numbers strictly to the left of the index is equal to the sum of all the numbers strictly to the index's right...\n            if (leftSum == rightSum)\n                return idx;     // Return the pivot index...\n\n            // add current elements with leftSum...\n            leftSum += nums[idx];\n        }\n\n        return -1;      // If there is no index that satisfies the conditions in the problem statement...\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
